m_szDocTitle: Patent US20080261116 - Method of depositing silicon on carbon materials and forming an anode for ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract A method of modifying the surface of carbon materials such as vapor grown carbon nanofibers is provided in which silicon is deposited on vapor grown carbon nanofibers using a chemical vapor deposition process. The resulting silicon-carbon alloy may be used as an anode in a rechargeable lithium ion battery.  Images(2)    Claims(22) 1. A method of depositing silicon onto a carbon material to form an alloy for use in lithium ion batteries comprising: providing a carbon material selected from vapor grown carbon fibers, vapor grown carbon nanofibers, PAN or
